name: game fragments
description:
This page is only temporarily up for the Melbourne Queer Games Festival and will be taken down on the 7th after the event is over.

Unfinished prototypes that I hope to finish one day. I wanted to submit at least one game to the Queer Games Festival but I don't have any finished games to show. 

I know they're not much but these prototypes are all I have to show. They were never intended to be released to the public but it at least shows I'm alive.

I would have combined them into a seamless single file but it broke and I didn't have time to find a solution. Unfortunately I am barely functioning right now.

Warning: Games do not contain trigger warnings, assume all are nsfw.
